channel.title: Need help with server auto restarter program
channel.description: ok so the program server autorestarter...that small one?..yea...it says offline restarting then it juss says done...nothing pops up like my runserver.bat or anything...is the server up?..and if so y cant i get on after it does that?...help plz?

item.title: Need help with server auto restarter program
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

@echo off title Fr33sc4p3 pkz - Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server tskill java

thats my runserver.bat…help me plz?..lol…hmm…it is named runserver.bat…i was thinking mayb i could name it run.bat…well anyway tell me wut u guys think plz?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 09:39:02 PM[/size][hr]no1 will help?..=-[

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with server auto restarter program
